com.stripe.android

Class Stripe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.android.Stripe

  • public class Stripe
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry-point to the Stripe SDK that handles - Token creation from charges, Card, and accounts - PaymentMethod creation - PaymentIntent retrieval and confirmation

      • createBankAccountToken

        public void createBankAccountToken(@NonNull
                                   BankAccount bankAccount,
                                   @NonNull
                                   TokenCallback callback)
        The simplest way to create a BankAccount token. This runs on the default Executor and with the currently set mDefaultPublishableKey.
        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the BankAccount used to create this token
        callback - a TokenCallback to receive either the token or an error

      • createBankAccountToken

        public void createBankAccountToken(@NonNull
                                   BankAccount bankAccount,
                                   @NonNull
                                   java.lang.String publishableKey,
                                   @Nullable
                                   java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                   @NonNull
                                   TokenCallback callback)
        Call to create a Token for a BankAccount with the publishable key and Executor specified.
        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the BankAccount for which to create a Token
        publishableKey - the publishable key to use
        executor - an Executor to run this operation on. If null, this is run on a default non-ui executor
        callback - a TokenCallback to receive the result or error message

      • createBankAccountTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createBankAccountTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                         BankAccount bankAccount)
                                                  throws AuthenticationException,
                                                         InvalidRequestException,
                                                         APIConnectionException,
                                                         CardException,
                                                         APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token for a BankAccount. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash. This method uses the default publishable key for this Stripe instance.
        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the Card to use for this token
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this BankAccount
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        CardException - should not be thrown with this type of token, but is theoretically possible given the underlying methods called
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers

      • createBankAccountTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createBankAccountTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                         BankAccount bankAccount,
                                                         @NonNull
                                                         java.lang.String publishableKey)
                                                  throws AuthenticationException,
                                                         InvalidRequestException,
                                                         APIConnectionException,
                                                         CardException,
                                                         APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token using a BankAccount. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.
        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the BankAccount to use for this token
        publishableKey - the publishable key to use with this request
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this BankAccount
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        CardException - should not be thrown with this type of token, but is theoretically possible given the underlying methods called
        APIException - any other type of problem

                        Card card,

      • createToken

        public void createToken(@NonNull
                        Card card,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                        @NonNull
                        TokenCallback callback)
        Call to create a Token on a specific Executor.
        Parameters:
        card - the Card to use for this token creation
        executor - An Executor on which to run this operation. If you don't wish to specify an executor, use one of the other createTokenFromParams methods.
        callback - a TokenCallback to receive the result of this operation

      • createToken

        publishableKey - the publishable key to use
        executor - an Executor to run this operation on. If null, this is run on a default non-ui executor

      • createSourceSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Source createSourceSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                SourceParams params)
                                         throws AuthenticationException,
                                                InvalidRequestException,
                                                APIConnectionException,
                                                APIException
        Blocking method to create a Source object using this object's key. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.
        Parameters:
        params - a set of SourceParams with which to create the source
        Returns:
        a Source, or null if a problem occurred
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers

      • createSourceSynchronous

                                                APIConnectionException,
                                                APIException

        Returns:
        a Source, or null if a problem occurred

        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters

      • createTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                              Card card)
                                       throws AuthenticationException,
                                              InvalidRequestException,
                                              APIConnectionException,
                                              CardException,
                                              APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash. This method uses the default publishable key for this Stripe instance.
        Parameters:
        card - the Card to use for this token
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this card
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        CardException - the card cannot be charged for some reason
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers

        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API

      • retrieveSourceSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Source retrieveSourceSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String sourceId,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String clientSecret)
                                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                                  APIConnectionException,
                                                  APIException
        Retrieve an existing Source from the Stripe API. Note that this is a synchronous method, and cannot be called on the main thread. Doing so will cause your app to crash. This method uses the default publishable key for this Stripe instance.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the Source.getId() field of the desired Source object
        clientSecret - the Source.getClientSecret() field of the desired Source object
        Returns:
        a Source if one could be found based on the input params, or null if no such Source could be found.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)

      • retrieveSourceSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Source retrieveSourceSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String sourceId,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String publishableKey)
                                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                                  APIConnectionException,
                                                  APIException
        Retrieve an existing Source from the Stripe API. Note that this is a synchronous method, and cannot be called on the main thread. Doing so will cause your app to crash.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the Source.getId() field of the desired Source object
        clientSecret - the Source.getClientSecret() field of the desired Source object
        publishableKey - a publishable API key to use
        Returns:
        a Source if one could be found based on the input params, or null if no such Source could be found.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)
